factoryName.metadata: Nombre de instancia de Data Factory

scripts.text:
DELETE from [bronze].[03]
DELETE from [bronze].[05]
DELETE from [bronze].[06]

scriptLines: query: 'SELECT DISTINCT fecha_inicio as fecha FROM silver.datos',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT fecha_fin as fecha FROM silver.datos',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT numero, imei FROM silver.datos',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT numero_a as numero, imei_a as imei FROM silver.llamadas',
query: 'SELECT DISTINCT numero_b as numero, imei_b as imei FROM silver.llamadas',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT 
    rbs_utilizada as radiobase, 
    celda, 
    latitud, 
    longitud 
FROM silver.datos',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT 
    rbs_utilizada_b as radiobase, 
    celda_b as celda, 
    latitud_b as latitud, 
    longitud_b as longitud 
FROM silver.llamadas',

query: 'SELECT DISTINCT 
    rbs_utilizada_a as radiobase, 
    celda_a as celda, 
    latitud_a as latitud, 
    longitud_a as longitud 
FROM silver.llamadas',
